title: A good local burger joint
text:
i like to try local fast food joints wherever i visit and this place did not disappoint me
for the fair price of 5 euros you get a really nice burger with fries
the location is also grear watching a busy street full of by passers

title: A trip down history lane
text:
words can't really describe the place, the view from the top is amazing not to mention the well preserved ruins of the temple of Athina, if only have time to see one thing in athens this is your place
i recommend you buy the combined ticket worth 30 euros from any other place such as temple of Olympian Zeus to avoid the long lanes
it can be really hot during the day so watch the weather and don't forget you bottle of water
